titles.title: Emergency Relief Fund Act of 1993
A bill to create an emergency relief fund for agricultural producers.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S8619)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Agricultural Production.

committee.name: Senate Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry
committee.subcommittee: Agricultural Production and Stabilization of Prices

bill.summary: 7/13/1993--Introduced. Emergency Relief Fund Act of 1993 - Provides special disaster relief for qualifying 1993 agricultural producers, including retroactive crop insurance and prevented planting purchasing authority. Directs the Federal Crop Insurance Corporation to establish an emergency relief fund to pay for such assistance.
